ComicInfo.Title: She Wouldn't Stay Dead!; I Wait in the Dungeon!; Jerry's New Job; Terror in the North!
ComicInfo.Summary:
She Wouldn't Stay Dead!: A man kills his annoying wife to get some peace and quiet. However, when he later meets and marries a girl he really likes, due to a strange sequence of events his first wife's soul is reincarnated into his new wife, making her as annoying as her predecessor.
I Wait in the Dungeon!: When a prisoner of a Soviet gulag is finally released from solitary confinement, he has been reduced to an animated skeleton.
Jerry's New Job: A man gets a job working as a file clerk in an office run by the Devil.
Terror in the North!: A man hunting a werewolf is so afraid of becoming a werewolf himself that he kills himself when he mistakenly believes that he has been bitten.
